parameters.name: NumOfCurves
parameters.description: Number of curves from which to create the object

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True creates a single reference curve feature, false creates a reference curve feature for each curve in the array

parameters.name: ErrorCode
parameters.description: Error code as defined in swFeatureError_e

)
